description:
Get complete visibility into application server performance and monitor various components of your .NET web applications. Track the performance of complex .NET web transactions from the end user to database perspective, allowing DevOps to pinpoint bottlenecks the application server, identify slow queries and correct them to increase application performance. 
	You need a Site24x7 account to start monitoring your ASP.NET applications. Sign up for a 30 day trial at https://www.site24x7.com and pass your license key as a parameter, as follows, 
	choco install site24x7-apminsight-dotnet -ia license.key=site24x7_licensekey
author: Site24x7
